about_the_game:
Get ready to take your games to the next level with this awesome new pack from Sonancy Designs. Featuring extended and longer music themes (with the average track being almost 5 minutes long) this DLC is packed full of high-intensity battle music, tender, inspiring love themes and melancholic themes for sorrow, lament, drama, high-paced orchestral romps for adventure, this pack has everything you need for your fantasy adventures!

Features:

Longer than average music - songs average almost 5:00 each!
20 BGM in WAV, OGG, MP3 and M4A formats
Royalty free music for your games
Licensed for RPG Makers or the game engine of your choice

Tracklist:

1 - A Hearts Wish
2 - A Heros Tale
3 - A Town Between Realms
4 - Blood Magic
5 - City of Broken Souls
6 - Dawn of a Tranquil Sun
7 - Eighth, The Underlord
8 - Kokohiko Village
9 - Lacuna, Reflection of Memories
10 - Mimis Oddments and Novelties
11 - Moonlight Forest
12 - Plague of Nightmares
13 - Reality Grip
14 - Scallywags Tale
15 - The Final Showdown
16 - The Ninth Layer of Hell
17 - The Underworld Awakens
18 - The Wasted Wilds
19 - Waltz of Resplendent Wind
20 - Wander Into the Wilderness
